TestCase.Title: Test case EID_CLIENT_D_19
TestCase.Purpose: This test unit evaluates the preselection of the access rights contained in the CHAT of the eService certificate (CHAT restriction).

Command.Text: Follow the Online-Authentication as described in until the access rights are displayed.

ExpectedResult.Text: The access rights of the eService are displayed.
The eID-Client has preselected all access rights contained in the CHAT of the eService certificate displayed in the user interface.
